unit: Unit 7 | Inference for Quantitative Data: Means
title: Constructing Certain Types of Mean Intervals: Respect Your Boss
question_text: An insurance company is assessing two of its regional managers (Manager $A$ and Manager $B$ ) on how well-respected they are by their employees. The insurance company randomly selects $40$ employees from both regions. They ask the employees to rate how much they respect their managers on a $1-10$ scale, with $1$ representing no respect and $10$ representing the utmost respect. Here are the summary results: Company N Average Standard Deviation A 40 8.1 1.4 B 40 6.2 1.1 Which of the following represents a $99\%$ confidence interval for the difference in the averages between how much company $A$ 's employees respect their manager when compared with company $B$ 's?
